codes.code: argmax 'For each Latin question, you need to comprehend the question and generate an accurate response in Latin. Keep in mind that your answers should maintain the proper grammatical structure of the Latin language. Provide the answer only. 1. Pater fīlium suum vērum dīcere iubet: “Vērum ~, mī fīlī!” Choose from this set of possible answers [ dīc, Dūc, Fac, ēs fer, Es] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-003' where ANSWER in [ 'dīc', 'Dūc', 'Fac', 'ēs fer', 'Es']
